item.title: Distributed Machine Learning: How Does it Work?
item.dc:creator: Bruce Mauger
item.description: State of the art AI requires orchestrating large clusters to perform a single synchronised calculation. How does this orchestration work? And how can it be done without incurring expensive communication overheads?

item.title: Boosting for Causal Effect Estimation
item.dc:creator: Bruce Mauger
item.description: Can you boost when you don't have labels?
